articles.title: Ri Yong Ho Meets New Swedish Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Ri Yong Ho Meets New Swedish Ambassador to DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho had talks with Jonas Michael Wendel, new Swedish ambassador to the DPRK who paid a courtesy call on him on Wednesday.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets TASS Delegation of Russia
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets TASS Delegation of Russia
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho had a talk with a delegation of Russia's TASS led by Director General Sergei Mikhailov Wednesday.
					 He referred to the invariable stand of the DPRK to develop the DPRK-Russia relations based on the long tradition of friendship and cooperation in the spirit of the top level agreement and joint documents.
					
					 It is the steadfast will of all the service personnel and people of the DPRK to shower fire on the U.S. which cried out for totally destroying the DPRK and settle accounts with the showdown with the U.S. that has lasted century after century by dint of unprecedented strategic force, the nuclear deterrence which is a precious fruition of the Korean people's bloody struggle for defending the destiny and sovereignty of the country from the protracted nuclear threat of the U.S. imperialists and a treasured sword of justice, he noted.

articles.title: Kim Yong Dae Meets TASS Delegation of Russia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Dae Meets TASS Delegation of Russia
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Dae, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, had talks with a delegation of Russia's TASS led by Director General Sergei Mikhailov at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday when it paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from TASS
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from TASS
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from TASS of Russia.
					 The gift was conveyed to Kim Yong Dae, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Wednesday by Sergei Mikhailov, director general of TASS who is leading its delegation on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: TASS Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
TASS Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Russia's TASS led by Director General Sergei Mikhailov visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and patriotic careers of his family members, the delegation looked round the historic relics preserved at the old home in Mangyongdae.
					
					 It also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the Natural History Museum and other objects and laid bouquets at the Liberation Tower.

articles.title: Art Performance Given to Celebrate WPK Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
Art Performance Given to Celebrate WPK Founding Anniversary
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- An art performance "Song to Great Mother Party" was given at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre Tuesday, the 72nd founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, Presidium member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party and armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions and those of organizations and industrial establishments in Pyongyang and labor innovators and overseas Koreans.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations and military attaches of foreign embassies here and their spouses and other foreign guests.
					
					 Put on the stage were choruses "Mother's Birthday" and "Long Live Workers' Party of Korea", mixed quartet "We Sing of the Party" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers represented the greatness of the WPK which has brought up all the people as masters of the revolution and creators of merits, recording only victory and glory for over 70 years.
					
					 Jangsaenap duet and kayagum ensemble "Sea of Apples at Foot of Chol Pass" and other numbers reflecting the Korean people's enthusiasm and optimism of building a socialist paradise for the people by their own efforts revved up the atmosphere of the performance.
					
					 In the female sextet and chorus "We Cannot Live without You" and chorus "Song of Advance of Socialism" the performers sang highly of the strong spirit and will of the army and people of the DPRK dynamically advancing toward the final victory of the socialist cause while sharing their destiny with the WPK.

articles.title: Art Performance Given with Splendor
articles.content:
Art Performance Given with Splendor
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- A music and dance performance of the State Merited Chorus, the Moranbong Band and the Wangjaesan Art Troupe is going on at the North Phyongan Provincial Art Theatre.
					 The performance began with the National Anthem. Put on the stage were light music "Pyongyang Is Best", male chorus "Korea Does What It Is Determined to Do", dance "Dash toward Future" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The artistes of the State Merited Chorus showed the Korean people's trust and feelings of thanks of the Korean people for the Workers' Party of Korea with solemn artistic depiction. And they represented strong images of the Korean army and people advancing forward the eminence of a powerful socialist nation.
					
					 Narrative poem "Oh, North Phyongan Province, Glorify the Socialist Paradise" instilled a firm revolutionary will into the officials, working people and youth and students in the province.
					
					 The artistes of the Moranbong Band successfully represented the light music and serial songs "Oh Party, It's Thanks to Your Care."
					
					 Female solo "We Call You Father" and mixed chorus and male chorus "We Cannot Live without You" sang in high praises of the deep trust of the service personnel and people in respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also put on the stage were famous music of the times including "Changsong Today".
					
					 Artistes of the Wangjaesan Art Troupe added splendor to the performance with dance pieces.
					
					 Watching the performance were officials, working people, youths and students of the province.
					
					 The performance will go on.

articles.title: Participants in Celebrations of Anniversary of Revolutionary Schools Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Participants in Celebrations of Anniversary of Revolutionary Schools Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The participants in the celebrations of the 70th anniversary of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They went round the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum and the historic relics at the President's old home, recalling his undying feats and brilliant life. 
					
					 They also toured the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt Taesong, at which they laid bouquets at the bust of anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk and paid deep respects to her.
					
					 Then the participants visited the Korean Revolution Museum and the Phongchon Revolutionary Site.
					
					 At the museum, they went round historic relics and materials on display in several rooms to grasp the exploits and noble world of comradeship of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. And at the site they looked back upon the leadership feats and revolutionary careers of the peerlessly great persons who devoted themselves to the building of the independent defence industry.
					
					 Besides, they toured the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri and the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery and enjoyed art performances and spent a pleasant time at the Rungna Dolphinarium.

articles.title: Sunchon Catfish Farm Completed in DPRK
articles.content:
Sunchon Catfish Farm Completed in DPRK
 Sunchon, October 11 (KCNA) -- The Sunchon Catfish Farm was newly built in the DPRK.
					 The farm has a combined control room, hatchery and fry raising block, indoor-fattening block, 10-odd outdoor plastic-walled pools, heating room, etc.
					
					 It, equipped with an integrated production system, is now raising hundreds of thousands of fishes including catfish, tilapia and sturgeon.
					
					 A ceremony for its inauguration took place on Wednesday.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants went round the catfish farm.

articles.title: Edible Herb Soup Certified
articles.content:
Edible Herb Soup Certified
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Kosongryong Teahouse under the Jongphyong County Public Catering Establishment in South Hamgyong Province has been well-known from 10 years ago for serving tasty bean-paste soup boiled with edible herbs like leopard plant, anise and bracken.
					 The soup has been highly appreciated by local people for its excellent flavor and high nutritive value.
					
					 Recently, the Korean Association of Cooks selected the soup as one of local famous dishes and awarded a certificate to it.

articles.title: Electricity Production Increases in DPRK
articles.content:
Electricity Production Increases in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Electric power producers across the DPRK are increasing the production in the spirit of frustrating the ferocious sanctions of the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces by dint of self-reliance.
					 As of October 8, thermal power plants produced over 10,000kWs more electricity in October, as compared with the same period of the last year.
					
					 The Pukchang Thermal Power Complex directs efforts to boosting power production with less coal consumption, while the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex pushes ahead with the technical innovation movement for increased production.
					
					 The same is true of the Sunchon, Chongchongang and East Pyongyang thermal power plants which fulfilled their production plans in September.
					
					 Among hydropower stations taking the lead in electricity production are the Hochongang, Sodusu and Paektusan Hero Youth power stations.

articles.title: No One Can Criticize DPRK's Access to Nuclear Weapons
articles.content:
No One Can Criticize DPRK's Access to Nuclear Weapons
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Media and experts of the world comment that the nuclear deterrence of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea is to repel the U.S. invasion and everyone knows that the U.S. forced the DPRK to the possession of nukes and threatened its security by war exercises, but only the White House denies this fact. They also say that the DPRK will never give up the nuclear weapons.
					 Media and experts of the world who used to approach the DPRK's bolstering up its nuclear force with misunderstanding and antipathy have undergone a change in their appreciation of it, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The DPRK has developed and possessed nuclear weapons to cope with the U.S. nuclear threats and blackmail.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nukes and development of nuclear force are a legitimate right of a sovereign country to self-defence as it has been exposed to constant threat by the U.S. obsessed with the ambition for world hegemony.
					
					 No one can deprive the DPRK of this right and fault the DPRK's legitimate exercise of the right to self-defence.
					
					 No one can change the basic strategic position of the DPRK, a nuclear weapons state and nuclear power.
					
					 The nuclear force of the DPRK is a powerful war deterrent and putting spurs to its development will ensure more durable peace.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Military Warmongers' Confab
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Military Warmongers' Confab
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces recently held a meeting of the south Korea-U.S. combined defense council in Seoul where they were closeted over the rotation deployment of U.S. nuclear strategic assets on the Korean peninsula and transfer of military technology together with their master U.S. under the pretext of "intensified joint defense posture" and "securing of core military capability."
					 Meanwhile, they steadily staged provocative saber-rattling such as a short-range anti-aircraft mobile drill together with the U.S. imperialists present in south Korea.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary that this goes to clearly prove once again the despicable treacherous nature of the south Korean puppet warmongers offering south Korea as an aggressive supply base of the U.S. and serving as cannon fodder for a nuclear war against the north.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The present south Korean authorities often talk about "peace", but this is no more than a cynical ploy to cover up their despicable nature of war servants of the U.S.
					
					 The puppet warmongers are bringing about a nuclear disaster while wrecking peace on the peninsula as the war servants of the U.S. Their action is no more than an act of strangling by themselves.
					
					 If the provocateurs dare ignite a war for aggression, we will wipe out the aggressors to the last one so that there would be no one left to sign a surrender document. This is the fixed will of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet forces should be mindful that they would suffer a horrible disaster, if they work hard as a shock brigade for war against the north at the instigation of the U.S.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Hit for Trumpeting about Dialogue in Parallel with Enforcement of Sanctions and Pressure
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Hit for Trumpeting about Dialogue in Parallel with Enforcement of Sanctions and Pressure
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the south Korean chief executive said at a meeting with representatives of four ruling and opposition parties that "they should put pressure upon the north through cooperation with the U.S. and leave the door open for further dialogue." He in the meantime let a spokesman for Chongwadae assert that "they have stressed dialogue for peaceful settlement of the nuclear issue of the north and are pushing forward it together with sanctions and pressure".
					 A vice-minister of Unification and a special assistant to Chongwadae for unification, diplomacy and security affairs are trumpeting about "dialogue in parallel with enforcement of sanctions and pressure", saying that "sanctions and pressure are not contradictory to dialogue and negotiations".
					
					 Commenting on these outbursts, Minju Joson Wednesday says that their remarks are sheer sophism that does not deserve even a passing note.
					
					 Disclosing the sinister aims sought by the puppet forces in making such sophism, the commentary says:
					
					 Sanctions mean confrontation and, accordingly, can not go together with dialogue based on respect and trust in rival party.
					
					 It is unreasonable to talk about "dialogue" while resorting to "sanctions and pressure" against fellow countrymen, and this is an act of denying dialogue and blocking the road to it.
					
					 Dialogue and contact aimed at nuclear dismantlement of the DPRK and sanctions and pressure upon it can never be allowed.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities sincerely want dialogue between the north and the south, they should oppose and reject the Trump group's hostile policy towards the DPRK, instead of trumpeting about " dialogue in parallel with enforcement of sanctions and pressure" pursuant to the aggressive outsiders, and stop the treacherous act of joining in the barbarous "sanctions" against the fellow countrymen and prioritize the nation and do things beneficial to the fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean Women's Union in Japan Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean Women's Union in Japan Marked
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Oct. 9 to mark the 70th founding anniversary of the Union of Democratic Korean Women in Japan (UDKWJ).
					 Among those present were Chairman Ho Jong Man of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Kang Chu Ryon, vice-chairwoman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee and chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union, and Han Tong Song, director of the Organizational Department of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee.
					
					 A congratulatory message from respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was conveyed at the meeting.
					
					 Then introduced was a congratulatory message from the Central Committee of the Socialist Women's Union of Korea.
					
					 In the wake of Ho Jong Man's congratulatory address, Kang Chu Ryon made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said the 70-year history of the UDKWJ is a history of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's wise guidance and benevolent love, recalling that the Union and Korean women in Japan have covered the road of patriotism under the warm care of the great Generalissimos and respected Marshal Kim Jong Un over the past years.
					
					 They stressed the need for all the union officials and Korean women in Japan to creditably carry out the tasks set forth in Kim Jong Un's congratulatory message and thus make new leap forward and innovations and usher in a new heyday of the Korean women's movement in Japan in the great era of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Meeting Marking Anniversary of UDKWJ
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Meeting Marking Anniversary of UDKWJ
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the participants in the meeting marking the 70th founding anniversary of the Union of Democratic Korean Women in Japan (UDKWJ) on Oct. 9.
					 The letter extended the highest glory and warmest thanks to Kim Jong Un who was so kind as to send a congratulatory message to the meeting, giving it the highest honor, and indicated the general orientation of the union in the great era of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It praised him as their father who takes warm care of the union and Korean women in Japan and the great teacher who lights the road ahead of the movement of Korean women in Japan and leads it to work new leap forward and innovations, braving ordeals, it noted.
					
					 The final victory of the patriotic cause of Chongryon, the bright future of the Korean community in Japan and the happiness of Korean women in Japan lies in holding Kim Jong Un with loyalty, it said, adding this is the immutable faith and will the past history of 70 years implanted on their mind.
					
					 The participants in the meeting will glorify through generations the nature of the first organization of overseas Korean women, which inherited the glorious tradition of the Korean women's movement, and discharge the honorable responsibility and duty of the union in the work for the final victory of the patriotic cause of Chongryon and thus surely live up to the particular love and trust of Kim Jong Un with loyalty, the letter said.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Koreans in China
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the General Association of Koreans in China on Tuesday, the 72nd birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The letter extended high respects to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the highest glory and the warmest congratulations to respected Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the 72nd founding anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 The letter said:
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, who regarded the party building as an essential issue of the revolutionary struggle from the very period he started his revolutionary activities in his early years, gave an origin to the building of a Juche-type revolutionary party with the formation of the "Down-with-Imperialism Union" and consolidated the organizational and ideological foundations for founding the party during the anti-Japanese war of 20 years.
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Jong Il formulated the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism through his extraordinary wisdom and energetic ideo-theoretical activities, set the programme of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism and led the WPK to invariably preserve its character as the Kimilsungist party, the glorious revolutionary party of Juche, and provided a model of revolutionary party building and activities to the progressive people in the world.
					
					 Today the WPK with Marshal Kim Jong Un carrying forward the noble intention of the great leaders without a single inch of deflection as its chairman is dynamically pushing ahead with the grandiose drive to hasten the final victory of the Juche revolution, tightly grasping the helm of history.
					
					 The letter said that the General Association and all Koreans in China are filled with the strong will to believe in and follow only the respected Marshal in any storm and stress and advance forever under the leadership of the WPK.

articles.title: Foreign Newspapers Observe Holidays of DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Newspapers Observe Holidays of DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of different countries gave special write-ups to the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and its 72nd birthday between October 2 and 4.
					 The Lao newspaper Pasason in an article "Party building exploits of Comrade Kim Jong Il", illustrated with his smiling portrait, said that he set it as the most important task in the whole course of leading the WPK to build up it into the party of President Kim Il Sung and successfully carried it out.
					
					 The Egyptian newspaper Al Akhbar Almassay in an article stressed that under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Il, the WPK as the headquarters of the revolution had made world-startling achievements in the struggle to realize the cause of the popular masses for independence and that his party building exploits would go down through centuries.
					
					 The Cambodian newspaper Nokor Thom Daily said in an article titled "Kim Jong Un, he is chairman of the WPK":
					
					 Chairman Kim Jong Un strengthens the WPK into iron-willed vanguard ranks advancing by dint of ideology and unity.
					
					 All his activities to glorify the WPK as the genuine motherly party making selfless, devoted efforts for the good of the people are consistent with priority to the people and respect and love for them.
					
					 The Korean people, deeply attracted by his profound loving care for them, are turning out as one in the struggle to implement the lines and policies of the WPK, entrusting their destiny and future to him and calling the Party as mother.

articles.title: Lectures on WPK Held Abroad
articles.content:
Lectures on WPK Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Lecture meetings took place in Mexico, Bangladesh, Russia, Hungary and Slovenia between September 18 and October 3 to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and its 72nd birthday and the 91st formation anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 The chairman of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism praised the feats of President Kim Il Sung who set out on the road of revolution in his early years to pioneer the revolutionary cause of Juche and accomplished the historic cause of founding the Party.
					
					 The chairman of a branch of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea elaborated on the fact that the main factor of the WPK's invincibility lies in the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the guiding idea, and the steel-like unity of the whole Party and the absolute support and trust of the people.
					
					 The chief of the Moscow Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Russia said that the WPK has led the struggle of the Korean people only to victory for more than 70 years since its foundation and that it is thanks to the wise guidance of Comrades Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un that the WPK could become a powerful party as today.
					
					 The chairman of the Workers' Party of Hungary noted that respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un aroused the entire party and all the people to holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal leader of the WPK and implementing his behests and that the DPRK has emerged a nuclear and rocket power under his leadership.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Nigerian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Nigerian Newspaper
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian newspaper Nigerian Observer on October 4 carried respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" on the occasions of the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 72nd birthday.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that it is the principled requirement for victorious advance of the cause of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the WPK. And it indicates the tasks for steadily strengthening the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Ofrecida funcion artistica por el dia de fundacion del PTC
articles.content:
Ofrecida funcion artistica por el dia de fundacion del PTC
Pyongyang, 11 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 10 en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este la funcion artistica en homenaje al 72o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					La vieron Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y del CC del PTC, y otros cuadros del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente del partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del Partido, las fuerzas armadas, las entidades de masas, los ministerios y organos centrales, los funcionarios de los organos, fabricas y empresas de esta capital, los innovadores laborales, asi como los compatriotas en ultramar.
					
					En la ocasion fueron invitados los conyuges de los representantes diplomaticos y de las organizaciones internacionales y los de agregados militares, acreditados en Corea, y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					En la escena se pusieron los coros "Cumpleanos de madre" y "Viva el Partido del Trabajo de Corea", el cuarteto mixto "Cantamos el partido", el solo de violin y trio femenino "Pienso" y otras piezas.
					
					Los ejecutantes encomiaron la grandeza del PTC que en su trayectoria de mas de 70 anos registro solamente la victoria y gloria y formo a los uniformados y civiles como dueno de la revolucion y creadores de la proeza.
					
					El solo folclorico femenino y pangchang masculino "Es mejor en el mundo nuestro socialismo", el duo de Jangsaenap (instrumento de viento de madera coreano) y cancion con acompanamiento de Kayagum "Mar de manzanas al pie del monte Chol", el octeto femenino y el coro "Otro gran auge con la bandera de autofortalecimiento en alto" y el baile "Abanderados de autofortalecimiento" describieron la alegria y el optimismo del pueblo coreano que construye con sus manos y con sus propias fuerzas el paraiso socialista.
					
					En el sexteto femenino y coro "No podemos vivir sin el" y el coro "Cancion de la marcha del socialismo", los cantantes reflejaron el impetu valiente del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos que marchan con pasos firmes hacia la victoria final de la causa socialista, depositando el destino en el PTC.

articles.title: Nadie puede censurar la posesion de armas nucleares de la RPDC
articles.content:
Nadie puede censurar la posesion de armas nucleares de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 11 de octubre (ACNC) -- Los medios de prensa y los especialistas del mundo estiman que el disuasivo nuclear de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea es para defenderse de la agresion de Estados Unidos. 
					Aunque todos conocen -agregan- que el ultimo obligo a aquella a fabricar el arma nuclear amenazando su seguridad con los ejercicios de guerra, solo la Casa Blanca se obstina en negar este hecho.  Afirman finalmente que la RPDC no renunciara nunca el arma nuclear. 
					
					Senala asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este miercoles y continua:
					
					Se va cambiando el criterio de los medios de prensa y los especialistas del mundo que tenian malentendimiento y antipatia sobre las medidas tomadas por la RPDC para el incremento de sus fuerzas armadas nucleares. 
					
					La RPDC desarrollo y poseyo esos artefactos para hacer frente a la amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU. 
					
					La posesion de armas nucleares de la RPDC y la elevacion de su nivel devienen el derecho a la autodefensa de un Estado soberano sometido a la amenaza permanente de EE.UU., enloquecido por la ambicion de tomar la hegemonia mundial. 
					
					Es inalienable este derecho legitimo y nadie puede censurarlo ni cambiar la posicion estrategica de la RPDC como portadora de armas nucleares y potencia nuclear. 
					
					Las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC constituyen el poderoso disuasivo de guerra y el aumento acelerado de ellas significa la garantia de la paz.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun advierte a los belicistas del circulo militar surcoreano
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun advierte a los belicistas del circulo militar surcoreano
Pyongyang, 11 de octubre (ACNC) -- Hace poco, los titeres surcoreanos convocaron en Seul la reunion del "consejo conjunto para la defensa" Sur de Corea-Estados Unidos. En esta ocasion, discutieron con sus patrones gringos la ampliacion de las propiedades estrategicas nucleares norteamericanas, que se ubican de manera rotativa en la Peninsula Coreana, y el traslado de las tecnologias militares bajo el cartel de la "defensa conjunta" y la "adquisicion de la capacidad militar medular".
					Por otra parte, libraron sucesivamente junto con las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea los ejercicios provocativos como entrenamiento de movilidad antiaerea de corta distancia.
					
					Este hecho revela de nuevo la sucia naturaleza antinacional de los belicistas surcoreanos que entregan el suelo surcoreano como base de abastecimiento militar de EE.UU. y se ofrecen como carnes de canon de su amo norteamericano para la eventual guerra de agresion al Norte de Corea.
					
					Senala asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este miercoles y continua:
					
					Las actuales autoridades surcoreanas suelen hablar de la "paz" en su artimana para ocultar su abominable naturaleza de sirvientes de EE.UU. para la guerra de agresion anti-RPDC.
					
					Es un acto suicida el proceder de ellas que perturban la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y acarrean los desastres de guerra nuclear. 
					
					Los militares y civiles coreanos estan decididos a eliminar hasta el ultimo de los provocadores para que ninguno pueda firmar ni el acta de capitulacion siquiera, si ellos se atreven a lanzar la agresion.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos deben tener presente que si siguen actuando como ahora, sufriran terribles consecuencias.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena disparate de "simultanear sancion y presion con dialogo"
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena disparate de "simultanear sancion y presion con dialogo"
Pyongyang, 11 de octubre (ACNC) -- En las recientes conversaciones con los representantes de los 4 partidos en el Poder y oposicion el mandatario surcoreano dijo que deben presionar al Norte de Corea en cooperacion con Estados Unidos pero dejando abierta la posibilidad de dialogo. 
					A instigacion de el, el portavoz de Chongwadae y otros disparatearon que vinieron haciendo enfasis en el dialogo para la solucion pacifica del problema nuclear del Norte de Corea y promueven tambien el dialogo con la sancion y presion.
					
					 El viceministro de Unificacion y el asesor especial de Unificacion, Relaciones Exteriores y Seguridad de Chongwadae anuncian de "simultanear la sancion y presion con el dialogo" diciendo que las primeras dos no contravienen al ultimo.
					
					 No vale la pena discutir ese sofisma, pero si hace falta revelar la siniestra intencion que hay en su trasfondo.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual fechado 11 y prosigue:
					
					  La sancion es un acto de enfrentamiento incompatible con el dialogo que se basa en el respeto y la confianza en la contraparte.
					
					  Hablar del dialogo recurriendo a la "sancion y presion" contra la parte connacional es un acto ridiculo que niega el dialogo y cierra sus posibilidades.
					
					  Son intolerables e irrealizables el dialogo y el contacto para el desarme nuclear y la sancion y presion sobre la RPDC.
					
					  Si las autoridades surcoreanas desean de veras el dialogo N-S, deben rechazar la politica hostil anti-RPDC de la banda de Trump, dejar el acto vendepatria de sumarse a la "sancion" sobre la parte connacional y hacer cosas provechosas para esta dando prioridad a la nacion, en lugar de hablar de "simultanear la sancion y presion con el dialogo" dejandose llevar por las  fuerzas extranjeras agresoras.
